## About
Muhammad Hussain Arslan is an accomplished AI architect and software engineer with 7+ years of experience building enterprise AI products, agentic systems, and workflow automation solutions.

- Agentic Systems & AI Agents
- Enterprise AI Products
- Full-Stack Development
- Workflow Automation
- Software Architecture
